title: The ORIGINAL Santa Claus Waving Winter WiperTag for Christmas Holiday with Decal attaches to rear vehicle wiper blade
features: UV protected against fading and cracking
Detachable and interchangeable for other designs
Window decal is laminated for additional protection with a removable backing and can be trimmed to fit
WiperTag arm measures 12" L x 3.5" H. Decal measures 9.75" W x 10" H
description: These are the ORIGINAL, AUTHENTIC, WAVING SANTA WIPERTAGS, not to be confused with other listings made in China. This adorable Santa Claus design will put a smile on anyone's face. When the rear wiper is on, it creates a waving motion that kids (and anyone behind you) will love. WiperTags attach with locking strips which allow you to interchange with hundreds of other designs. Both can be reused several years with proper care
